summary: This document is a letter from Alan Dershowitz to Detective Joseph Recarey regarding concerns about an investigator allegedly impersonating a police officer. Dershowitz defends his team's conduct and provides details about an encounter with a witness, highlighting the witness's hostility and previous legal issues. The letter aims to clarify the situation and ensure cooperation in the ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Dershowitz writes to Detective Recarey addressing concerns about his investigators' conduct in the Epstein matter.

persons.name: Joseph Recarey
persons.context: Recarey is the recipient of the letter, raising concerns about an investigator impersonating him.

persons.name: Barry Krischer
persons.context: Krischer is copied on the correspondence, indicating his involvement in the case.

persons.name: Lanna Belohlavek
persons.context: Belohlavek is mentioned as part of Dershowitz's investigative team.

persons.name: Daliah Weiss
persons.context: Weiss is also part of Dershowitz's investigative team and is copied on the correspondence.

persons.name: III
persons.context: III is the individual the investigators were attempting to interview, who displayed hostility.

connections.description: Dershowitz is representing Epstein and is communicating with Recarey regarding the investigation.
Belohlavek is part of Dershowitz's investigative team.
Weiss is also part of Dershowitz's investigative team.
M is the boyfriend of III, who was the subject of the investigators' inquiry.

events.title: Investigation Attempt
events.description: Investigators attempted to interview III at her residence but were met with hostility.

locations: 345 S. County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: Alan Dershowitz addresses concerns raised by Detective Joseph Recarey regarding an investigator's alleged impersonation of a police officer.
The letter includes details of an encounter where investigators faced hostility from III during an attempted interview.
III has a history of legal issues, including a recent arrest for possession of marijuana and drug paraphernalia.
Dershowitz emphasizes the professionalism of his investigative team and their intent to gather truthful statements.
The letter seeks to clarify misunderstandings and ensure cooperation in the ongoing investigation.
